name: berbtab2bsml
description: convert info stored in BER btab files into BSML documents

options.description: [REQUIRED] Dir containing BSML documents (repository) • --output,-o [REQUIRED] output BSML file containing bit_score information • --btab_dir,-b [REQUIRED] Dir containing btab files • --max_hsp_count [REQUIRED] Maximum number of HSPs stored per alignment • --gzip_output [OPTIONAL] A non-zero value will result in compressed bsml output. A .gz extension will be added to the output file name if it doesn't already exist. • --query_file_path,-q [OPTIONAL] The input fasta file to ber. • --class,-c The ref/comp sequence type. Default is 'assembly' • --project_abbreviation,-a The project abbreviation, used in id generation. See Ergatis::IdGenerator for details. • --help,-h This help message
